body: before anyone mentions, yes i'm aware images are bugged on a bunch of layouts on blogs, i gotta figure out how astro injects images on .md posts then ill handle business... this will come during my reading week (maybe)

testing this function! it works.... enough. not sure how long i'll service this, if i even keep it for much longer. i've come to an acceptance regarding my usage of microblogging spaces, with a realization that best practices usually require the removal of interaction with wider community as to avoid the pitfalls i will discuss at a later time. but it's here!
